addons.name: A319
addons.description: The A319 (Shorter A320) is one of many upgrades introduced by Airbus to help maintain its A320 product line’s position as the world’s most advanced and fuel-efficient single-aisle aircraft family. The baseline A319 jetliner has a choice of two new-generation engines (the PurePower PW1100G-JM from Pratt and Whitney and the LEAP-1A from CFM International) and features large, fuel-saving wingtip devices known as Sharklets.

tracks.name: CFM Public Build
tracks.description: The stable edition is for those who need a stable home cockpit API, or controlled upgrades every few months. This edition will always be behind the development edition in both features and fixes, but it will receive compatibility patches if required for MSFS updates. Please visit our discord for support.

addons.name: 74S
addons.description: The Boeing 747-8 is the largest variant of the 747. It features a thicker and wider wing, allowing it to hold more fuel, as well as raked wingtips. The aircraft, powered by the more efficient General Electric GEnx engines, can carry 467 passengers in a typical three-class configuration, and has a range of 7,730 nautical miles.

tracks.name: Stable
tracks.description: Stable is our variant that has the least bugs and best performance. This version will not always be up to date but we guarantee its compatibility with each major patch from MSFS.

tracks.name: Development
tracks.description: The development version has all the latest features that will end up in the next stable. You may encounter bugs more frequently.

addons.name: FSLTL Traffic
addons.description:
FSLTL is a free standalone real-time online traffic overhaul and VATSIM model-matching solution for MSFS.

Utilising native glTF models and MSFS independent online IFR/VFR traffic injection system with stock ATC interaction based on Flightradar24.

This is the base model / livery pack required for FSLTL Injector, MSFS default live traffic or VATSIM use.

tracks.name: Stable
tracks.description:
Stable release of the aircraft models, liveries and VMR file.

This packages is required to see matched models / liveries if you are using FSLTL Injector, MSFS default live traffic or VATSIM.

A vmr file is provided in the package for VATSIM client use.

addons.name: FSLTL Injector
addons.description:
FSLTL Live Traffic Injector - giving you a more immersive experience at airports globally!

- Live IFR and VFR traffic based on Flightradar24

- Parked aircraft based on historic real data for immersive full airports

- Ability to have any combination of IFR, VFR and parked aircraft

tracks.name: Stable
tracks.description:
Stable version of the FSLTL Traffic Injector for use on stable versions of MSFS.

Follow the user guide at https://www.fslivetrafficliveries.com/user-guide/ before use.

tracks.name: Experimental
tracks.warningContent: No support is offered for this release, it is a preview of features that may be included in future releases.
tracks.description:
Experimental Release that includes features that are not yet ready for stable release.

You can provide feedback on these new features in the FSLTL Discord.

No support is offered for issues with this release, new FSLTL users should use stable.
